name: GetPageOfActivityGroups
description: Use this endpoint to load a page of Activity Groups.

Filter.description: Use this parameter to set the filtering for fields. [filtering instructions](#section/Retrieving-data/Filtering)

Sort.description: Use this parameter to set the sort fields and direction. [sort instructions](#section/Retrieving-data/Sorting)

PageSize.description: Use this parameter to set the page size. [pagination instructions](#section/Retrieving-data/Pagination)

SkipPages.description: Use this parameter to set number of pages to skip. [pagination instructions](#section/Retrieving-data/Pagination)

$ul: **costAccountClosed**: The account number to register costs for closed activities.
**costAccountOngoing**: The account number to register costs for ongoing activities.
**costAccountOngoingType**: The type of account for costs for ongoing activities:
**costContraAccountOngoing**: The contra account number to register costs for ongoing activities.

**includeCostPriceInFinance**: If set to true, activity costs will be included in accounting.

Filterable: eq, ne, lt, lte, gt, gte

Sortable: false

**includeSalesPriceInFinance**: If set to true, activity revenue will be included in accounting.

Filterable: eq, ne, lt, lte, gt, gte

Sortable: false

**name**: Name of the activity group.

Filterable: eq, ne, lt, lte, gt, gte, in, nin, like

Sortable: true

**number**: The unique number of the activity group.

Filterable: eq, ne, lt, lte, gt, gte, in, nin

Sortable: true

**objectVersion**: The object version, required for PUT requests.

Filterable: not filterable

Sortable: false
**salesAccountClosed**: The account number to register revenue for closed activities.
**salesAccountOngoing**: The account number to register revenue for ongoing activities.
**salesAccountOngoingType**: The type of account for revenue from ongoing activities:
**salesContraAccountOngoing**: The contra account number to register revenue for ongoing activities.
**type**: Activity group types:

**developerHint**: Some hints for the developer that might help avoid the error.
